channel.title: [URGENT] Trading Bug [URGENT]
channel.description: Well, When I put an item in too trade in my server then decide i dont wnat to give them that item, when i decline it deletes my items.. but the other person it doesnt, he just has to remove his items before he declines. PLEASE HELP. PEOPLE ARE QUITTING BECAUSE OF THIS.
